message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 might be a bit too high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $130 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $115.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand that $130 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $125.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price, but $125 is still a bit too much for me. I'm willing to go up to $122. This is my final offer, let me know what you think.
I understand that $125 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $123.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I'm willing to pay $121. This is my final offer.
I understand that $123 was still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $122.
